From the same vortex that let loose Cerberus came the four nightmares, =C6g=
er, Fames, Bellum, and Obitus. All had mutated versions of horses for Beast=
 Modes, and all could fly in beast mode. As they traveled to the Destron ba=
se they picked up the sent of something familiar.
    "There will be time f=
or them later," Obitus said.
